patterns: What types of cars do you sell?
responses: We offer a wide range of cars, including new and used vehicles.
Our inventory includes both new and pre-owned cars from various brands.

patterns: Which type of brands are available?
responses: Yes, we have Toyota, Ford, Porsche, Honda cars in our inventory.
You can find a variety of Toyota, Ford, Porsche, Honda vehicles in our showroom.
Our inventory includes popular brands like Toyota, Ford, Porsche, Honda.

patterns: Can I pay with credit card?
responses: We accept credit card payments and offer financing options for your convenience.
You can pay with credit card or explore our financing solutions.

patterns: When will I receive my car?
responses: Once purchased, you can expect delivery within 2-7 business days, depending on your location.
The delivery time for purchased cars typically ranges from 2-7 business days, based on your location.

patterns: What features do your cars have?
Can you tell me about the features of your cars?
responses: Our cars come with various features, including advanced safety technologies, infotainment systems, and more.
Yes, we provide comprehensive car servicing, including regular maintenance, repairs, and inspections.

patterns: When do you open and close?
responses: We are open from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday.
Our opening hours are from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday.
Our dealership is located at Katraj Pune.
You can find us at Katraj Pune-411046.

patterns: How do I book a meeting?
responses: Certainly! You can schedule an appointment by calling us at 7218048163 or emailing us at pategaurav5@gmail.com
To book a meeting, please contact us via phone or email. We'll be happy to assist you.

patterns: Can I schedule a test drive?
How can I test drive a car?
responses: Absolutely! To schedule a test drive, please contact us and we'll arrange it for you.
Yes, you can schedule a test drive by contacting us. We'll ensure you have a great experience.

patterns: Do your cars come with a warranty?
responses: Yes, all our cars come with a standard warranty. Contact us for details about the warranty policy.
Our cars are covered by a warranty. Feel free to inquire about the details.

patterns: Can I purchase a car online?
responses: Yes, you can purchase a car online through our website. We offer convenient online sales services.
Online car purchases are available through our website. Browse our inventory and make your purchase hassle-free.

patterns: What financing options do you offer?
Can you explain your financing plans?
responses: We provide various financing options tailored to your needs, including low-interest rates and flexible repayment terms.
Our financing plans include competitive rates and personalized solutions to make your car purchase affordable and convenient.

patterns: Can I trade in my current car?
responses: Yes, we accept trade-in vehicles. Contact us for an evaluation of your current car's value.
You can trade in your current vehicle towards the purchase of a new one. Get in touch with us for details about the trade-in process.

patterns: Can I see your current inventory?
responses: Certainly! You can view our current inventory on our website or visit our showroom for a firsthand look at our cars.

patterns: What are the prices of your cars?
How much do your cars cost?
responses: Our car prices vary depending on the model, condition, and features. Contact us for pricing details on specific vehicles
